item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

[quote=“exe12, post:112, topic:320460”][quote author=Nemesis- link=topic=416937.msg3105294#msg3105294 date=1264094772]
There’ve been lots of rumors around, one of them is that i put a botnet on client? i mean seriously. if you want to make this server die, just ddos it, trash talk is just lame.
second is, that there’s lots of abusing, but truth is ,there’s none, and these are only banned accounts, i can tell you reasons too:

Kekse <- Temp 1 week ban, Multilogin (He’s Exe12 in moparscape, that’s why hes posting so much bullshit)
Lulz <- Temp ban for spam, flame and racism.
I R Finfag <- Permanent ban for flame and racism.
All Day <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Racism, Abusing bug, Talking bullshit, Advertising
Mo <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Racism, Abusing bug, Talking bullshit, Advertising
Mod <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Racism, Abusing bug, Talking bullshit, Advertising
Admin <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Racism, Abusing bug, Talking bullshit, Advertising
Adm <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Racism, Abusing bug, Talking bullshit, Advertising
Anc13nts <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Racism, Abusing bug, Talking bullshit, Advertising
Haxed <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Racism, Abusing bug, Talking bullshit, Advertising
Wow Fag <- Offensive name
P4n <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Abusing bug
Anar <- Staff impersation, Spamming, Flaming, Abusing bug

Mods can’t even attack or be attacked.

If player is taken into jail ,there’s reason and he’ll be teleported out after small converstation, if he starts flaming or being racist, he’ll be muted and be there for longer time, if he still continues ,by logging on another char and spamming, he’ll be banned.

Please, grow up and don’t post bullshit again.
[/quote]

Haha,hilarious ,just get lost.[/quote]
How about you get lost from posting bullshit on my thread?

Read full topic

  3. Im out of this bullshit talk now i dont want to arguee anymore with you because i know i has right.
  4. i dont know (all day, exe12, miles ) or what eva, i dont know em… (hope they can post in here and admit that).
  5. K thx n Bai.

I haven’t played CS:S since my school started (7.01.2010), I don’t see point of this flame war, i guess its just the internet that makes people immature.

Lol’d…Alot…

I dont think its a bad server its got a good concept but its been poorly run… At the end of the day this is just a game…yes a GAME… Its not real… No need to bitch and moan about it and try to score points by flaming people… And im sure if C R O O K S really wanted to take the server down he would either :

  1. Release source if he had it…
  2. Constantly flame the server posting and/or in game - ip banning is easy to get to get round to there is no real protection around it.
    All ive seen him do is defend himself.

Anyways thats my 2pence although i know its not really needed but hey everyone else does it.

Back on topic…
I like this server and with a few modifications to stop mods being able to abuse, it would be very good…

It’s worth a try.

:D[/quote]
This is true, btw i apogolised crooks after i made that post, Mods have been demoted, from now on players vote for mods, i approve if application is good.
